column4: what do you want to migrate, specifically?  Obviously you can't migrate folders, since they only exist in imap
i believe that i want to migrate the mailboxes

that would be imap server specific, so you would have to start there.  It's been months since I did it, and I don't really remember a lot of the specifics.  I have some work stuff to do here; when I get a break I'll see if I have any useful notes from when I installed imap.
